section.title: Inheritance: object inheritance vs. layer inheritance
section.para: You might've read about layout inheritance (things not defined in a layout inherit from the core, for example) and read about the more familiar object inheritance (an undefined method Poodle::bark() inherits from Dog::bark()) and asked yourself…

para.emphasis: "How do object inheritance and layer inheritance interact? Which comes first?"

section.para: Object inheritance happens first and is saved into the layer. At the very end, when layers are combined to make a vtable for a style, that's when layer inheritance happens.
